sectionSubtext: Podcasts will be released here as they are published. Check back soon or follow us on Twitter for the announcements.

podcasts.description: Chantastic talks with Daria about building considerate components with TypeScript. They cover various topics related to TypeScript including interfaces, any, unknown, utility types, and declaration files. Additional topics include Flow, Visual Studio Code, and more.

Chantastic talks with Evan about the promise, and future, of 'Build once: Run Anywhere' that React Native and Expo are helping to make a reality (finally). Topics include Expo with platform-specific code, accessing and controlling the camera on native, React Native, Software Mansion, and more.

Guillermo joins the host Jeffrey Meyerson to discuss NextJS, and his vision for how the React ecosystem will evolve in the near future, as features such as React Suspense and Concurrent Mode impact the developer experience.
Brian joins host Jeffrey Meyerson to talk about his extensive work in the JavaScript ecosystem. Topics include Serverless, DynamoDB, JAMstack & CDNs, WebAssembly, AWS, and his vision for Begin.com.
Ryan joins host Jeffrey Meyerson to talk about hooks, state management, React Router, TypeScript, and Suspense.
Chantastic talks with David about XState, model-based testing with xstate-test, and the future designer/coder integration.
Chantastic talks to Becca about Refactoring â€” how to make your React code a little more liveable, human-friendly, and ready for anything.
Tejas joins host Jeffrey Meyerson to talk about the evolution of React and its broader development ecosystem, including GraphQL, cloud databases, and newer primitives such as Hooks and Suspense.
